alerts.description: The National Weather Service in Oklahoma City has issued a Tornado Warning for downtown Oklahoma City and surrounding areas. Doppler radar has detected rotation in a severe thunderstorm. Take cover immediately in a sturdy structure on the lowest floor away from windows.
alerts.title: Tornado Warning

alerts.description: The National Weather Service in Oklahoma City has issued a Severe Thunderstorm Warning for Oklahoma City and surrounding areas. Thunderstorms capable of producing damaging winds, destructive hail, and intense lightning are moving through the area. Seek shelter indoors immediately.
alerts.title: Severe Thunderstorm Warning
